Madam President, every year, Sunshine Week is held  around March 16, the birthday of James Madison, who not only is a  former President, but the acclaimed ``Father of the Constitution.''

On its 20th anniversary, Sunshine Week continues to be a crucial  reminder of the need for transparency and open government.
